tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho gang gzhes la ches kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshas pa' da re zhes bya ba btang do/ de yang
'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i sbyin zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho de gzhes la chos kyang ston
rgyu te bcomaldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasan ( 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de
de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dang 'argyal tshab yon
tan byan zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis ma khyab pa' depal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzo brjade da pal zhes bya ba
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang sngon te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya lta tshab ye shes bsags zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na//
'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongs su grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang skyon te
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun pa
rnam dag ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yashes 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sdes zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshogade gzhes
la chos kyang sen te bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes 'byed ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo// de' yang 'dab chags na 'dzag rten gyi khams khang pa zhes
bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te[） ]'tsho 'de gzhesaM la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rnam
par soms zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes skyes zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes brtse gas pa zhes dub bu'ags te/
'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yashes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/
ka 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
ka/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyalatshab phyogs su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin
glu/ gshegA pabadebadag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des 3 byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo/ de'i
lang 'dabachags na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod do// de na de bzhin gshegs pardul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te//
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ma mdzadakyabadag po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jagarten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhesabya
ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des ) byang chub sems dpa' la
chab dra ma med pa zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' las 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yad dgapa/
ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te[） ]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te ) bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang
'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhade gzhes la chos kyang ston te ) bam ldan
'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btang ngo/ de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs zhes bya ba yod de/ da na de bzhin gsheg
pa thams cad rtser 'jugartsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs ste/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu brtsams pa'i
go chazhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tuso sor yang dag gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer pa dus
sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal po zhes bya
@#// ba btang ngo// de yang 'dab chags na/ 'jag rten gyi khams chu klung gang+ga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog tshas khyab bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//
denas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang
gsud bsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams gas med pa steng 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
gyi khams ma mdzad cos byab yod de/ don de bzhi gshegs pa la thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snodakyi chos kyi rnam
grangs kyi tshos kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de na de'i yan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i Ang stobs
)kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyib
dang chos mnyan pa'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ ! rigs kyi bu de 'dres la da bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis/ pad+ma brgyad blangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang bcom
ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor to// de nas pad de dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'das te/ 'jig rtan gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshel bya ka lan
ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod de// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzha po' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis
de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma de dag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan star 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas
pas pad+mad+made dag la rig par mdzad nas/ rag pa tsam gyis pad+ma de dag las kyang/ byang chub sems dpa' lus dag mngon par byung ngo// byung nas kyang bcom ldan 'das latshigs su bcad pa/
bad dag gas mngon par bstod nas ma snang bar gyur to/// bam po brgyad pa/ mtha' yas mkhyen mngang gang brag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mkhrub yas
chos rnams thugs su chud// khyod kyi rje 'phrul mtha' yas rgya na gda'// 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snyad bar mdzad// de dag sadas rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas// zhu paM' khyad par
kun tu zhu ba dang// sangs rgyus bsti dang phyag kyad brgya skad du// mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag/ ma mjed 'jig rten
khams su rab gnas pa// de dag skye ba gcig gse thogs pa ste// de dag mde dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// de dag go cha'i dngos pos ma 'dzagegs shange// sems can sman
pa' spyod du yang dag zhugs// byang chub mchog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rnam 'dren mchog la de dag zhu// tsa spyod mngon du chos tshel bgyid can// bdud rnams gnyom dang
byang chub thob snyad du// de nas zhu ba zhu ba'i sprul pa rnams // gang yin de lashAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dren pas yang dag tshig gas de bstan nas// ma mchog de yi tshig rnams thos gyur te/
dga' zhing mgu la rjes su yi rang nas// bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der na mi snang nas// gang dag de bzhin gshegs la zhu ba zhu// de dag
gang nas mchis shing mang ci zhes// de tshe 'khor kyang spu rnams zang zhes byed// 'khor rnams bzhi pa de dgagus pa yis// rgyal ba la na shubar ma sbe ste// de tsho'ajig rtenamagon
po' skyel pa la// de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzad do byud// mgon po zhu ba 'di zhu dag gang// zhus nas kyang na ma gda' ma mthong gyur/ de dag su lags de dag su yi/
lags/ mgon po bshad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// smon lam dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos// de yis byin gyis brlabs nas 'dir lhags te// shar phyogs kyi ni 'jig
rten khams kyi tshul/ gas med dag nas de dag lkugs pa yin// dpa' bo 'jig rten pan phyir gang lhugs pa/ rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste// bsam pa dag pa byang chub
bya'i phyed pa// de yi smon lam de na de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong// de dag 'dir ni de la spyod ma lug/ tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par ma 'gyur te//
thos pa mang zhing pha rol phyin pas 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslabs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar ma 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshorabs tshe rabs su//
de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjod ma 'gyur// rtag tu saa rgyas rnams dang mngon du phud// rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong
rnams rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba thob// mthong ma thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste// gang dag gzhan ma brjod pa de dag mang// dpa' bo de yi yon tan gang
ca yod pa// mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba med// dpa' bo shAne tu gnas pa de ya mang// de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de na phyin chad bud med mdzes ma 'gyur//
tsha sems can dam pa'i mchog tu de 'gyur ro// skyes pa bud med gang gas mang thos shing// thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la/ Dosangs rgyas zhing der smon lam 'debs byed pa/ lus
zla zhag nas ni der yad skyo bar 'gyur// zhade yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bud med 'on te gzhan yang rung// gang gis mang thos nam zhig dad byed pa// thams cad
byang chub ched las nyams ma 'gyur// gang dag gcer bu'i sems can ma gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skye ma 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de na yod ma gsungs//
'on kyang de dag dag dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsam pas mang yang thos pa na// ji ltar rtsi yis skyon rnams sel byed bzhin// sems can de dag gis na dir mthod ba//
byang chub don du nges 'gyur tha tsom med// gang zhig pa la sha ya 'dab thogasashadi// de dad der na rtswa dag byed gyur na// de tshe kun nas sman gyi stobs kyis su// sus kyang dor na ma
la tshigam 'gyur// gang tsha sprul gdug gza brjid drag po yis// dug gang de dag ma gdug khyed 'gyur te// sa yi steng na kun tu ston byed na// de 'dra'i sma na brkos pas na ci zhig/
bya[;]sbrul gdug dra ni gad dag snomo byed pa// sbrul de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// de ltar rtsa snyan 'dra ba'i ma de na// ming gsi sas rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur//
da tshe phyegos bcu dag tu bsgrags pa na// dpa' bo da ya mang na sus thos pa// de yis mang gas las na 'di byed de// bud med gang zag la na rog ma 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang bsta
stad byed cu skyes// de na rgyal bas dge slong gang sprul pa// kun dga' bzang po zhes na bya ba des// rgyal bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus
kun dga' bzang po go chadapa' bo'i ming// 'jig rten khams 'dir yod ces ngas thos na// zhum pa med pa'i yid kyis brjod par bya/ de ltar bde bar gshegs pas brab bstan/
pa3 rgyal ba'i byang chub yade ches dka' ba yi// sems can dge ba chud dang ldan pa lhags// da ltar nga la tsho na cung zad kha nas// kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod de//
de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dare lhags pa'i// dgo chab sngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog ma nus// kun dga' bzang skyong rin chen 'byung
gnas dang// dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang na ded dpon bzad// yon tan sbas pa mkhas dang de bzhin du// dpa' bo ba zad stobs gang yin de la ltos//
chu zhes bya ba dang na chu lha dang// khazang skyong de bzhin dge slong ba 'dra rnams // ji ltar skyob gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyis gom de bsam yas// don med ces
na longs su bsags gyur pa// de dag gis na don yod go cha bgos/ de dag mthod ba'ang don yod 'gyur ba yin// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ci dgos// kun dga' gang
su dag gis de dag mthong// gang dag su yis mde yang thos gyur pa// de dag nam yang byang chub dogs pa med// de dag nam du'ang log par ltung ma 'gyur// de dag thams cad
brtson pas tshogs pa yin// de dag thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur// rtag tu tshul khrims phung pos de rtag gnas// thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dga'
sangs rgyas zhing 'dir phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten da ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bo de ha go cha 'dod gyur pa// de la rgyal ba kun gyis bsngags pa brjod/ gang gas
bsngags brjod rgyal ba de dag kyang// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe der shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang// byang chub zhugs pa'i dpa' bo de dag blta'o// de thos
nas kyang gsol ba btab gyur pa// mgon po ma mdzad 'jig rten khams su mchi// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la bskor byas nas// byang chub sems dpa'ade dag thams cad lcags// dge slod de
dag ga yang mang shes nas// de tshe byang chub mchog du 'dun pa skyed// gang dag mang dang 'dun pas byado chub zhugs/ de dag rgyal bas byang chub der lud bstan// bskal pa gras med dag/
tu las byas shing// ma dag bsgrubs pa gang dag su yod pa// de phyir stages ma'i dus na de dag ni// nga dad lhan cig sangs rgyas zhing du lcags// nga yi byang chub mchog 'di thob gyur kyang//
de tshe sa nasacan blta dar sbe ba med// gang dag bya dus dag spyod rnams 'byung ba// rtsub dang gtum dang shin tu rtsub pa yin// de tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thob nas su// yang dang yang du brtson
'grus stobs skyed cing// mu ge'i dus su na rdzun sbyin pa byin// de dag rnams kyi sbyin pa rtsa ba pa yin// de dag 'di la gus pa cho byas nas// phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po da yi tshe// srog/
kyang btang nasadon na bya snyam ste// nga yi chos chog sbel zhing 'dzin par byed// dus de na no ma de ga'i las rnams kyi// smon lam gnas kyang 'dzage rten dag na yod// 'di na las de dag na byas pas
na de yatsho na banas pa'i tshul du 'gyur// de dag der na 'dra' chos shes nas// de tshe der na chos man 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa ma yin zhes// 'jig rten
phyan ca lag la kun dga' ltos//de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag pa cung zad med ces skyo thob pas// de tsho mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs// 'chi med thob par bya bya'i ma lus brtsal

pa bstan da reb tu rnam par 'jag thob nas//der na lha yang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de tsho'ajigs pa mthong na ma rung zhes// da lta'i dus su sha yad su snyam sems// bag tsha med pa'i sgrigs pa sgrogs pa ya
drad song cha de de rang bdag cag mthong// 'dren pa mchog gi zhal du lta bya dang// kyi ma rgyal bas bshad ces yi rangs so// dge slong bsam gtan byed pa dag kyang mthong// dbang thob rdzu
'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa// 'di ni tong 'dzani shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus su ji ltar mthong// sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing// de tshe tshul ldan shin tu

tshar gcad 'gyur// gnas khang gnas pa tshogs kyis 'thob 'gyur 'di//de tshe lha yod shanitu ma dga' 'gyur/kyes kyi ma bstan pa'ab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de dka' spyod pa de dag dge slong sdog pas char gcapar gyur
bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos// 'dar na phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur/des pa rnams la de dag bsngags man brjod// sangs rgyas la na 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim na gnas
pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dge bsnyen ma dang 'dre b.rabyed 'gyur zhing// de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed// rgyal ba'i bstan la ma gus gyur nas su// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par gyur
dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'tshe 'gyur te// de dag rtag tu des la rnams kyis spras// khyu mchog rwa chag ma gyur ma rus pa// de bzhin tshul khrims ldan pa rnam par steng// de tshe tshul khra
ldan pa dpyis 'gyur zhing// de tshadage slong sdog pas banas tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chenatsun tsalog gi dus sun)/ skyo ba thob byos bag kyad yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la
brtson 'grus skyed// de tshe 'dzags pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur/ stog pa'i dge slong rnams dang 'phrad ma byed// de yaMchen sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur/ de na byang chub semA dpa kun
tu blta pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos// 'di lta ste// dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhag gse lag pa bskums pa skyong bar byed pa 'am// brkyang bskums
par byed pa'askad cig des// de nas tsha ngabar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mamajed 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan nas la gnod pa chud ma/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/
stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog snyan gsal lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci
bcom ldan 'das de snyan ma mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba ma mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so////'jig rten gyi khams
bda' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhangagazhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das

des[u0f10]byang chub soms dpa' rgyal tshab tshas dbyangs nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i
daro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan nyidi gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab/
[%]chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan

'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i char pa zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin/
gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs zhes bya ba btang
ngo// de' pad 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho shing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
'dis des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mu khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes me tog
'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa 'dzani rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo// der yad 'dab chags na/
'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de palan gshegs pa gaTha brjod mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs taM/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasan )'dzage rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te[） ]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ut+pa la zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasan
badzag rten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems dpa' medaces bya ba btang do// de'i yad 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i skade pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
bab shegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag yangs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khrab mo 'gyur byed/
tsha ces bya ba btang ngo// de 'a yang 'dab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i dpal zhes ba bzhug
rgyute 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bya chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin sa bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan
zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba tang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhug
taM'atsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa rgyal tshab mal zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la dmar pos
khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhazhi gshegs pa skyes kyis rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems da ba brgyal
chab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas gzigs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das dus/ byang chub sems dpa ba rgyal tshab rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yad 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes
bya ba yod de/ de nad bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jogegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par gnon rtsis bya
ba btad do// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'jags dang 'jigs su rung bas ma 'jigs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'jigs pa brtas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
ta khatsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te ! bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs su rab grags zhes bya ba btang ngo/ de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes
bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ston du 'gro ba zhes
bya ba btang ngo// de'i gang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab snang sa bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me skyon shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes khachos/
kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das reg/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ma 'dzan zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od byed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhan
tsha gshigs pa rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo//

ts+tso de'i yang 'dab chags na/ jig rten gyi khams rab 'dzin zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyen du gshegs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyad ston te/ bcom ldan

'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang do// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rtan gyi khams skyes can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes

bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dang/ 'a rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
yon tan 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams da re can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs
te 'tsho zhing gzhes la ches kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sed med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'ojig rten gyi khams dga' 'byung/
zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das sa/ byang chub sems
dpa'argyal tshab smon lam rnam par bsgrags zhes bya ba btad do// da' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog ces bya ba bzhugs

te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des ! byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkar zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags// 'jig rten gyi khams skya rengs zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ded dpon zhes bya ba btang
do// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtog bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzad de zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos la kyang ston te/
'a// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang do/ de yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i deb la zhes bya/
ba ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyus nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen/

dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo//de'i lad 'dab gas na/'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
te bcom ldan 'das des/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen dbang phyug ces bya ba btang ngo// de' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'adi pa la zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin/
gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma dpal gyi skadi po zhes bya ba btad ngo//
de' yang 'dab chagason/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'khyud pa' de pal zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa me tog snatshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom
ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab u0f7c ye shes brtson 'grus zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
[/]pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhade gzhis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde byed ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags
ka 'jig rten gyi khams sha 'bos med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog bzang zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu
dbung mgo mtho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des ) byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu lho ba zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/
'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'argyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston taM/ bcom ldan 'das des/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab snyade rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha'
yas pas gnas pas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa 'argyal tshab shani tu rab gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang
'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
bo la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bi m+ma' 'od ces bya ba yod de/

tshade na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems tshad med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang
zlango// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa spun ma 'a yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'di gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mag po che zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod da/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgags pa kun gyi khyu mchog
thos bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' bo sa phyab btang ngo// de' yeng 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshogs mchog mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na ) 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi 'phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi/
khams rgyu skar gyi 'phred ba can de no/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpab rgyal tshab
pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te//

yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la mos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab la ga na pad+ma zhes bya ba
btad do// de'i yang 'dab chags na )'jabag rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mag rnam par dag ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg

ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ lhags nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ de'atsho 'og ga phyogs su 'jagi
rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'dzamed rten gyi khams nam ma ba'i dkyil 'kher rnam par dag ces khyab yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po zhes bya ba bzhug
te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' ran pa'i bu zhes bya ba blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung pa ston to/ de nas byang chub
sems dpa' ras pa'i dus snang ba chen po de mthor// gsung bsal ba'asgra de yang shos se// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das 'od kyi steng ba kun
chu gda' ba de dang/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de sub lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gas med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na
'jig rten gyi khegs ma mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes lachos kyang ston te/ mthu dan deb yanino//
de bshan gshegs pa don de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sde snod ams can thums cad yang dag par tsham par byed pa// sems can thams cad kyi 7tsom gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam

grangs yang dag par rab tu ston te/ ma khru de lta bu don de yin no// 'khor de na yod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa da pa med pa sems ba dag/chos bstan pa de nyan pa byed
de dag ga medi brjod pa tsam gyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de la Da byang chub sen
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim pa'i bus bde skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i sked du 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
der bdag mchibar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shesan song zhig/ nga' tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngag/ bskyod
pa yang ngan/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam[7 ]zhes snyan yang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim pa'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das deng/
zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste// dpe ran skyes khu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag ba bskums ba skyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skum par byed pa'aed cage des/ 'jig rten
gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas: de 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzod 'dir 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la
ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ang skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod ba chung dam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngan/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang
bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen po snyan gsol la ba/sa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisi/ byang chub sems dpa' rim pa'i bu la 'di skad ces bkab
stsal to// ragis kya 'u tsa sangs rgyas kyi khodi don/ bcom ldan 'das de gnod pa chung dam/ snyan tsha mda'i a/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lagA
so= de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa spyan chen la sogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal
'byung dang/ seng ge'i dpal dang don grub dang/ dpal sbas dad/ seng ge'i 'gam pa dang/ shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal de dang/ tshangs pa lhun po dang/ sbyin rnam par dag dang/
[rg]bya// don yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang/ sos kyi glang po che dang/ sa kyi dpal dang/ spos kyi lhun po dang ! spyan tshad med dang/ spos brtsegs dang//
ne chen lhun po dang/ shan tu rab gnas dang/ shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po dad sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dzin dang/ me sgron dang/ skar mda'
wa sgron ma dngo/ brtson 'grus don yod dang/ shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha dang/ seng ge dang/ semasacan gyi kha lo sgyur ba dang/ rab mchog rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po'i sangs
rgyas kyi zhing dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la sogs pa/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skya ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la kha dad bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcigetu 'khod do/// bam po dgu pa// /de'i tshe steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
grangs med dad/ga tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams tsan dan skyes kyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas dmar mngon du 'phags pa rgyal
zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa brgyal tshab da ro dpag tu med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nga re dpag tu med kyis snang ba chen po de mthong zhing/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa
yul mtha' yas par mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gda' ba de dang
gsung bsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ ! rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na ) 'jig rten gyi
khams ma mdzad ces bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'khor der yad chos mnyan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe med pa sems pa dag 'dus par gyur te 'khod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i thad du/ 'jig rten gyi khamasam mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sa bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes na song zhig/
0[9]/ nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung dam/ nyam da ba nyud dam/ bstod pa yang dam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa lags sam/ zhes snyan pad gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems/
dpa' dar dpag tu med/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la bskor ba byas nas song ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dad ldan pa zhigagis lag pa bskums
'a pa skyong bar byed pa 'am/ brgyad pa skam par byed pa'i skad cige des/ ! sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 'dug ste/ de rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i
N+NaM tshal bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la bo dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
'dug nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung dam/ nyam da ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ stobs dang bde
bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa yul mtha' yas par mngon du bags pa'i rgyal po snyan gsol lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ de la bka' stsal pa//
rigs kyi khu ci bcom ldan 'das de skun ma mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
u la mtha' yas par mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mngon du 'phags pa'argyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ de bzhin du/
de bzhin gshegs pa ya de gnyis yod dag 'dzoms dang/ rgyu skar bzad pa'i rgyal po dang/nyan mdzad dang/ 'od mdzad dang/ lhun po 'od dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang/
zas kyi gdugs dad/ spos kyi gdugs dang/ rin chen gdugs dod/ tsan dan gyi khang pa dang/ dga' ba'i dil la dad )rareb phung po dang/ rin po che'i 'od dang sa la 'debad
po' rkyel ba dang/ tshadas pa' da pa la dang/ rnam par dag pa'i skyen dang/ bag tsha ba mamada' ba dang/ sbyazang zhes byed pa'i 'dzags pa dad bral ba dang/ rin chen go cha naTha' yas dang/
bla na med pa'i 'od lngar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa du ba can gyi 'od kyi tog dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'argyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la sogs
pa gas med dbag tu med pa dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad ga la ba
dang )rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal ta phyogs gtsage du
'khod do// de'i tsheshar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
ka pad+ma'i me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun tu ston pa'i debal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to
bam ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa' byed tshub du lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mu ngan
bral gyis snadu pachan po de mthod zhi'i/ gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang gos so// thos nas kyad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun tu ston pa'i dpal
de ga la ba der song stelcani nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshayan/ 1 bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od gda'o ba de dang/ gsung bas
paba' sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na
'dzage rten gyi khams mamajed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhani gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
[4]/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis ma khyab de dang med pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston te// gsolapa
bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed der bag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom
ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la da bab par shes nasong zhige/ nga' tshog gas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar
rig pa la gnas sam ) zhes snyan yang gsol cage/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' mya dan bral/ bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal nas song ste// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang
ldan pa zhige gas lag pa bsams pa skyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skam par byed pa'i skad cig des/ 'dzag rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i 'os te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa/
shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol
to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung dam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ zhes de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
@#/// rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun tu ston pa'i dpa la snyan gsol lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de skun ma mang ba 'am//
stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba ma mnga' 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// de ltar de bzhin gshogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku kun tu ston pa la sogs ba//
tsho bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshags pa dmagis pa mtha' yas pa sa a rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'di dang/ de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma bkod pa'i khyu mchog dang/ dra ba
can gyi 'od dang/ 'od mtha' yas sangs rgyas me tog 'byung dang/ 'br-ichen sa la dang/ rin chen zla ba'i khyu mchog rtsi'i rgyal po dang/ sman dang/ ye shes mchog dang/ ma zhi du 'phags pa'i ga
tshadang/ lhan pa gong na med pa dang/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ me tog brtsegs dang )me tog rab gtor dad/ rtag tu mdzes pa'i 'od zer dang/ bla na med
pa' 'od zer dang shumakhe yos rnam par gnon dad/ gom pas rnam par gan dang/ gom pa mtha' yas pas rnam par gzhi dang smon lam na tha' yas dang/ spobs pa dpag med dang/
khyu mchog mtha' yas dang/ smon lam la nges pa dang/ mngal 'gyur mdzad dang/ skyon med 'gyur mdzad smon lam dang/ dmags ba'i go chadang/ sangs rgyas nam mkha' dang 3 byung ba'i dpal
ba ba gyi ses rgyas kyi zhing dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag dad/ gzhan dgag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ 'jag rten gyi khams ma/
mdzod 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de'alho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pan/ 'jag rtanagyi khams bkra shas bzad po zhes bya ba yod de/ 1 de na de bzhin gshags pa don yod grub ces bya ba bzhugs ta0 'tsho zhing gzhes 'chos
kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab don thams cad grub ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'os
zhes bya ba dang/ de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de ltar de la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa grub pa' go cha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang/ shani tu rab gnas go cha dang/ go cha mtha' yas dang/ mtshan gyi go chadang go chamatha' yas dang/ kun nas go cha dang ) mar
me mdzad dang/ 'od mdzad dang/ mdzod gcag pa dang/ skya ma mnga' dang/ dra ba can gyi 'od zer dang/ brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang/ rtse mo dang/ rtse mo mngon du 'phags dang/
'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang/ rnam par gzab sa dad/ don yod mang sgrogs dang/ 'jigs pa dang ! bag tsha pa thams cad rnam par 'joms mdzad dang/ yon tan/
ba mtha' yas rgyal po'i 'od dang/ phyi'i rgol ba thams cad nges par 'joms dang bdud thams cad kyi yul las 'das pa dad/ dpag med me tog dang/ bdud rtsi 'dzin dang/ dbyangs kyi/
ngar dpag med dang/ 'od khrir brtsigs dang/ snang ba'i dpal dang/ gnyis med bral ba'i dkyil 'khor can dang 'chi med rtogs pa'i me tog 'od dang/ 'od zer dang/ bdud rtsi'i dbyangs
dad lhun po'i 'od dang/ shad tu mthong dang/ sbyin bzang dang/ mchog gi tshogs can dang/ rin chen me tog dang/ rin chen 'byung dang/ zla ba me tog dang/ sems can kun gyi go cha dang
snying rigams cad 'gyur mdzad dang/ spobs pa mtha' yas dang/ rtsod pa dang/ bag tsha ba ma mnga' ba dang/ dmags[”]pa thams cad spobs pas spyod pa dang/ sangs rgyas bam
ldan 'das de dag dad gzhan dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag ! 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad ga la ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya grub pa'i zhabs la ma go bos 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//

ba ni/ de'i tshe nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'dzag rten gyi khams gras med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dan spyos zhes bya ba yod de: dan de bzhin gshegs pa kun du spos kyi 'od

zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to zhesakhyu ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te
zhes bya ba dang/ de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu spos kyi 'od zer la sogs pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshes gas kha spos kyi glang po che dang/ spos kyi khyu mchog dang/ spos kyi khang pa dang 'od kyi dkyil kher can dad/ 'od zeragyi rgyal po dang/ pad+ma mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po dad (sas rgyas khyu
mchog dang/ khyu mchog mtha' yas dang/ go cha bzang po dang/ shin tu go cha bgos pa'i dpal dang/ me tog rab gtor dang/ me tog gdugs kyi 'phrod ba dad me tog khad pa dang/ gser gyi
ma tog dang/ spos kyi me tog dad lhun po'i rgyal po dang/ sems can kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i go cha dang/ sems can thams cad skyon med 'gyur mdzad dang/ legs par spyad pa'i gacha/
dang :kun tu btang ba' 'od zer rab gtad dang/ pad+ma rab gtor 'byung ba'i dpal dang/ ranichen dra ba dang mngon du 'phags pa'argyal pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gdugs gcig pas khya'o pa dang/
rgyu skar gyi rgyal po dang/ dpung mgo shanitu zlum pa dad ) nitu yang dag zhugs kyi rgyal po dang ! sbes ldan dang ye shes ma sbrul gas khyu mchog dang/ don yod go cha/
bgos dang/ mthong ba don yod dang/ thogs pa med pa'i sbyin dang soms dang po bskyed pa dad ldan pa'i ma 'khrugs pa dang spun mtha' yas dang/ mar me bdag de dang/ kun tu snang ba dang/
'a snang ba' 'od zer dad sas rgyas kyi zhing dusams can thams cad gcad du med pa'i spobs pa dang/ rdul med rdul brul rnam par gnon dang de gom pa med kyis rnam par gnon dang/ sangs
rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'di dganas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems do 'chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi
khams mi mjed ga la ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te phyogs gtsug tu 'khod do// de'i tshe byang shar gyi phyogs
sgo mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrodabya zhes bya ba yod de dan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

ba 'aingasargyas mya ngan thams cad sel mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'a sa des/ byang chub sems dpa brgyalatshab don yod mang sgrol ces bya ba bla na med pa/

[rs]]yang dag par rdzogs pa 'byeng chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang/ de lta lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin/
dusbyarago/ de ltar bcom ldan 'bras de bzhin gshags pa mya ngan thams cad sel mdzad la sogs pa// 'jig rten gyi khams man du bgrod bya de'i yod pa rel na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun
med ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stond/ bcom ldan 'das des// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od chen po
zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'a sa kyis chos kyi skyes bskur ta btangado 2dang yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya pa yodad de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes
bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston ti/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag pa mag+ga' yas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de' yang 'dab chagasazho/ 'dzig rten spyi
khams yon tan 'byung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston du/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems
dpa 'a rgyal tshab phyad po'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'dzagi rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas kun tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun pa
mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab seng ge'i lhun po zhes bya ba btang do// de'i
yad 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sposakyi 'od ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyis rgyags par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbyangs kyis byin zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen brtsegs zhes bya ba yod de/ da na de
bzhin gshegs pa ko'u nyid rgya zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i depal zhes bya ba
btang do// de'i lad 'bachags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthu dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
bcom ldan 'das des 3byang chub sems dpa'argyal tshab tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba btang ngo/ de' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pal zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs
pa ut+pal dmar pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma 'byung zhes khyab btang ngo// de'i yang
'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu da zhes bya ba yod du/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ku mu da 'byang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan '//
des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'jigs pa med ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab sgrogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bdud
chos bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab gong na med pa'i gza brjid ces bya ba btad do// da' yad 'dab chatshosan
'jig rten gyi khams spos bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ dran bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogos can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhinge gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brtul zhugs bzang po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha'
pas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'argyal tshab dpal gyi stong pa zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags
na 'dzag rten gyi khams tsan dan smros zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'di gzhas la chos kyang ston te/
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba zhes bya ba yod de
la de na de bzhan gshegs pa phyogs su rnam par bsags zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'dre gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par bskrugs

pa' stobasakyi rgyal po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasaMnA/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhinagashegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po tshogs kyi de dag po zhes bya ba/
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes khyu ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams
kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshags pa snang ba mtha' yas dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho shong gzhes lachos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems

dpa' rgyal tshab dra ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chagasan 'jig rten gyi khams spos snang zhesakhya ba yod de/ de na de bzhinagashogs pa spros med mchog gi lhun po zhes bya ba
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par rgyal ba srung ba can zhes bya ba btang do// de'i yang 'dab chagasan/ 'dzag
rten gyi khams ma 'i rdzogs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pam 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byad chub sems
dpa'argyalu tshabaskye bo' dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yad 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog rtsas bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa bde 'byung dpa' zhes bya ba
bzhugs taM ) 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yodiganyis zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yid 'dab chagasanaM/ 'jig rten gyi
khams snang ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas spyod pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te 2 bcos ldan
'das des/ byang chub sems da pa ba rgyal tshab 'gro ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang bdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon
tan kun gyis so sor brgyan ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dga' spyod ces bya ba btang ngo/ da' yang
'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dri bas kun tu khebs zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/
bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab metog 'byung mngon du 'phags pa/'a depa la zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
rgyal mtshan sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshags pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/
byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pas ma pham pa zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'dzageg rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang sngas 'od
zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'argyal ba kun nas sbas zhes bya ba btangad/ der pad 'dab chagasan/
'ge rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed mngon du 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te[） ]'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyad ston te/
bcom ldan 'das des byud chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yeshes sman zhes bya ba btang ngo// de la yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rtenagyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gsheg
pa spyod pa tha dad med 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te ! bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dang 'a rgyal tshab spyod pa tha dang med ces bya ba btang ngo//
ba' de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa da ro bsdams zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshozhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab da ro 'bar zhes bya ba btang ngo// de 'a yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
nam mkha' dekyil 'khor rnam par dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lcan po mchog ces bya ba btang
ngo de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon dga' zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshanam med pa'i dar nges pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhingagazhes
la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba btang ngo// de' yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba zhes
bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon du 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa'i
rgyal tshab case 'dzags zhes bya ba btang do// de'i yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rtenagyi khams tshas ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
@#/ bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshas pas mchod ces bya ba btang de/ de'i yang 'dab chags na
'jig rten gyi khams spros can zhes bya ba yod// de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/

byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang pos byin zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bad can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun pa 'a 'od ces bya ba bzhug
'a tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya mtsho zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me khyed
ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spun gyi
'od zer zhes bya ba btang ngo// de yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad mchog ga 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te[7.]
'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde
'a khan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa grags ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te )'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyad sten te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po//
byan zhes bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'dab chags na) 'jige rten gyi khams shani tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhi gags pa bshes gnyen grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhade
gzhes la chos kyang ston te 2 bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub so mas dpa'argyal tshab sa dag ltar gnon ces bya ba btad ngo// de la yang 'dab chagasan/ 'jig rten gyi khams sA la zhes bya ba yod de/
de na de bzhin gshegs pasA la'i dbang po 'argyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa la' de bang po 'otog ces
bya ba btang ngo// de'i yang 'ab chags na/ 'jige/ rten gyi khams snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
kyang ston te bcom ldan 'das des/ byadachub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod gom pas rnam par gnon ces bya ba btad do// de ltar byed shar gyi phyogs mtshams nas/ byang chub sems
dang bskye ba ga cag gas thogs pa grangs med dpag tu med pa dag lhags te/ lhags nas kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheb/sa pa shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal 'di
bskor ba byas te/ rnam pa du mas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'bab zhag la lta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// tshe 'dzig rten gyi khams de gang lha dad ) klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'du chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu che ba bsam gyis ma khyab cinge/ dpe med pa'i go cha bgos pa dag gis ma khyab pa'i bar ni
than 'khar ba bzhag pa tsam yang med do// de dag thams cad kyang gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med de/ chos mnyan dpa' srid da// ! bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba lhur len cing 'bod do//
byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa' le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub se mas dpa' 'dus pa chen po de na khyon nas/ gdan de la bzhugs
bzhin du dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ba ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ rdo rje'i skade po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs
nas nges pa'i tshig med pa'i gnas la gnas pa bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ bkod pa gcig pa zhes khyo ba'i tang ngo 'dzin la snyoms shugs so/
de las bzhengs nas/ seng ga'i gdugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ sgrub pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba' teng nge 'dzin la snyoms
bar zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ seng ge rnam par bskyanges pa zhes bya ba' ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ 'od zer rgyal po zhes bya ba'atang
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ so'i sdong po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so/ de las bzhengs nas/ mngon par mi dmigs pa zhes
bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ seng ge rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i tode de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ zla ba'i
dkyil 'ar rgyal po zhes bya ba' tong de 'azhi la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs
nas 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ phyag rgya
thams cad bsgrub pachos kyi dbyangs su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nges 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas ) smon lam dang dmigs pa mtha' yas ston pa zhes bya ba'ating nga
'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad khyumchog tu gyur pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas
[q ]da ma gas pa gtsage pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so/ de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad kyi gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzal
ca snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas: 'od zer ma 'a yas sangs rgyas pad+ma mngon du 'phags pa bslab da zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ de las bzhengs nas/

yaM chos thams cad shin tu byang ba dam med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i teng nge 'dzan la
snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas khyu mchog mtha' yas kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par baphrul pa zhes bya ba ra ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas
sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i go cha zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengasanas/ chos thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul zhes/
bya ba'i tode de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ khyu mchog tugyur pa mtha' yas pa kun tu ston pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa sa bya ba 'a taded 'dzin la snyoms
ra zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ dmigs pa thams cad sangs rgyas pa'i bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i tong de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs da dang
da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa'i chos thams cad nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas chos thams cad kyi dbang sgyur ba' se ngas rgyas khyu mchog ces bya !
btod de 'dzazhi la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'ating nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so/ de las bzhes nas/ brtan pa zhes
bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ rab tu 'phel ba zhes bya pa' ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs su/ rab tu ma g.yos ba zhes bya/
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ ma 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thums cad la lta ba dang
rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sa// de las bzhes nas/ kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ mnyam par
rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ lta ba dang rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ted de 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengasanan/
ma lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so/ de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad thogs pa med pa dang lan pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/
de las bzhengs nas/ dbang po dang ldan ba zhes bya ba'i tod du 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ ma zed la zad ma shes par des pa zhes bya ba'i ting de
'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ lags pa ma zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ dmas pa gcig pa zhes bya bas/
zhitang de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i tedi nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ bkod pa mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i
y+Yo ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba'ating nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs phyogs/ de las bzhengasas/ sems can thams cad kyi deb
ba'anub yang dag par skul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba mngon du byed pa zhes bya ba 'a ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyanas dar zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ smad bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ chos thams
cad ston ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzani la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snang ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs/
so/ de 'as bzhidas nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos thams cad kyi sgrib pa med pa'i gi rnam par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/
'a bo'i thums cad kyi sgrib pa med par rnam par dag pa'i dgeba'i rtsa ba lang dag pa spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/
g.yagan rje'i 'jig rten gyi smyug bsngal rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzazhi la sems par zhugs so// de las bzhengs nas ) sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byams pa chen po bsgrub pas dge
ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par spyod pa zhes khyo ba'ating nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de las bzhes nas/ ma g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting de ni la snyoms par zhugs sa sogs de lta bcom ldan
'das ma ga yoda' ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs pa nA/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dgags mngon par bstod pa na ga yo khares pa sa g.yo medan ge yol
bsnyen dka' lhun po 'dra ba rnam par mdzes// phas kyi rgol ba thams cad zil mnan nas// stong gsum 'jig rten shani tuslangs te bzhugs// sa rgyas thugs nanis yang rten/
ma mchis// 'jig rten bsam gtan mdzad pa gang zag mchog/ mdi tsam bsam gtan pa skye gar ma gnas// sangs rgyas zhi tan de 'dra bsam ma khyab//
grub pa khams gsum des byung ra gi sa gsum ldan// rtag tu mnyam gzhag som nyi lo mda' bdes// the tsom gcad cing som nyi bsal du gal// srog chags rnams la sman slad chos bstan
gsol// thub pa rab gnas son ni mi mnga' la res/ khyad chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de dag/ dpa' bo chos kyis 'phags shade chos la danas// som nya ga cad cade the tshom
bsal du gsol// sangs rgyas mag pa rten bsam gtan mdzad ma lags// sangs rgyas mag ma brtan par sgom na lab/sa/ rten dang brten man mag kyang mchis ma lag/// bsam
gtan de ni 'phags pas mngon par bstags// grub pa gal te ma ston bstan tan mdzad// rgyal bas 'dzem pa mnanas paros par gyur/ 'di'i na me ge med bsam gtan mdzad pan//
[/ ]sangs rgyas ma mchis brten nas sgom ma lags/ @#/sangs rgyas dbang po drug rten sgom na lags// rgyal ba dbang po sa mchos rten ma lags// 'di la mu stegs gzhan med de dag
khrul// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'gro ba rtogs ma lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma g.yo ba'i ting de 'dzin las bzhengs nas// byang chub sems dpa'atshog
la rjes su rnam par gakhrigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ta'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ ra dwa ta'i bu chos bzha pa 'di dag na/ thag ba chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi yongs su
nyams par ma 'gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dad 3 mngon par ma dmags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yi shes bsgrub pa dang/ sbyin pa'i sdebs bsgrub pa dad/
tshul khrims kyi stegs bsgrub pa dang/ bzod pa'i stobs bsgrub pa dang 3 byams pa'i stobs bsgrub pa dang/ skang rje'i skyebs bsgrub pa dang/ ting nge 'dzan gyi stobs bsgrub pa dang/ shes rab
kyi stobs bsgrubs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thogs pa med pa khasgrub pa dang/ shes rab kyi rab tu dbye ba basprubo pa dang/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa bsgrub pa dang/
gcad du med pa dang/ dga' ba dang/ rno ba dang/ rbab pa'i spobs pa mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa dang/ gzungs thob pa dang sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang/ mngon pa'i 'bung ba thob par
'gyur zhing/ ji ltar 'tsham pa' dege ba'i tshogs dang bral bar ma 'gyur ) los spyod ma tshang ba med par 'gyur/ g.yog 'khor ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ) gzugs mtshang ba med par/
'gyur ) yan lag dang nying lag ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ) mag dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus ma tshang ba med par 'gyur/ sems ma tshang ba med par 'gyur/
lam ngan par zhugs pa ma yin par 'gyur/ sams 'khrugs pa ma yin par 'gyur/ dran pa rmos pa ma yin par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur/
dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/ ngo tsha shes pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ stage pa thams cad bya ba la 'dzem pa dang gyod pa can du 'gyur/ dran po mchod par
'gyur/ skye ba rnam par log par 'gyur/ dran pa dang ldan pa yang yin te/ dran pa'i stobs mchog dang ldan pas sngon gyi smon lam yang ma gtong bar 'gyur/ sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ bdag gi med pa dang/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sems kyi tshogs kyadage ba'i rtsa ba dbag tu med pa yang bskyed par 'gyur/ sems can
thams cad dang thun mong du byed par yang 'gyur/ sams can du dmigs pa las rnam par dben pa la lang mkhas par 'gyur/ chos rnams rtogs par yod du chud par yad 'gyur zhing/
chos la rten pa ma yin par yod 'gyur ro// de rtan pa yod ma yin pas/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sum/ de las gzhan da' soms snyan lam dun par zhugs pa rnams kyis
thul bar ma nus te/ byang chub skadi yi dpung gnyen du yang 'gyur ro// rang gi stan la 'dug ste/ chos thams rtsod shin tu byung ba du ma med pa'i khyig rgya'i ting nge 'dzan la gnas nas/ skad cage
[s]]gcig dang ldan pa 'a shes rab kyi se gang cung zad shes par bya ba dang/ blta bar bya ba dang/ thob par bya ba dang/ mngon du bya ba de dag thams cad kyang mdan du byed par 'gyur zhing/ ma lus/
par man du byed la/ thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya bar kho nar 'gyur thams cad mngon par rtogs pa kho nar 'gyur/ thams cad yongs su shes pa kho nar 'gyur zhing/ bag chags kyi
mtshams sbyor ba ma lus pa nyade rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shAr dwa ta'i bu 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas go cha chen po gyon par byed pa yin/ sems
can 'di dag thams cad na 'dod chags dang/ zhi stong dang/ gti mug dag gas yongs su gang ba/ sems can 'di dag thams cad na mgon med pa' 'chi bar nye bar gnas pa/ na thag
bani ba'i 'chab thob kha ) g.yang sa chen par ltung bar 'gyur ba/ sems can 'a de degan 'chi ba la gso ba red dka' ba dang ldan pa'o snyam ste/ lta ba chen pos sems can la lta pa 'a go cha
gyon par byed pa yani/ sems can de dag la bdag gas khams gsum pa las nges par 'byung ba'i klog pa chen po de yang dag par bsgrubs nas bstan par bya'o// sems can thams
cad gas bar bgos pa'i phyi'i yongs su ma btsal cadi/ gsol ba ma btab par bdag cag giso blta bar bya dgos so// dza ltar semos can rnams kyis gzugs kyi chos nyid ma ga pos pa
rjes su shob par 'gyur ba dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dad/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid tsha ga les ba rjes su thob par 'gyur ba dang/ rgyu na
las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam ma g.yos pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gso bas bdag cag gas sbyor bar bya'o snyam du/ de de ltar sems shing gocha bgos nas chos tshol ba la mkhar

tsho brtson pa yin te/ chos gang dag tshel bar byed ce na/ de dag na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang/ sas rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste/ 'di lta ste
sems can thams cad kyi phyogs tsam gcod par byed pa ! sems can thams cad yang dag dar tshim par byed pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bzung ba dang/ dbang po gzhi tu rgyal pad ma yin par bsgrub pa
yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyi'i/ chos de dag yongs su tshol bar byed do/ de ltar chos yongs su tshol ba la man par brtson pas gnas pa yin te/ than sangs rgyusakyi mtshan dang ldan pa
tshigs su bcad po zab mo dang ldan pa// thabs la mkhas pa dang/ na zab mo dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam lus la thogs te/ sems can gcig tsam la
yang yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa yin/ chos de'i don dang gas su bcad pa de'i don gang yin pa de/ sems can de dang sams can thams cad kyis kun shes par gyur
[4]ga/ ces de lta bu'i smon lam 'debs par byed pa yin no// de dge ba'i rtsa ba sa mchog gtso bo/ rab mchog/ gya nom pa// sangs rgyas kyis rjes su gnang zhing//
'phags pas rjes su gnang la/ mkhas pas bstod tsang/ mdzangs pas ma smad pa'i chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ dran pa gcad du med pa yan/
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dran pa nges pa yani/ bdag nyid kyis kyang chos kyi snod du byed pa yani/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rten du gyur pa yud yan/ de la brten
nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos ston par mdzad de// chos gnyis pa 'di lad rjes su thob par 'gyur te/ gzungs thob par 'gyur
ba yin/ skye ba rnam par leganas kyang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thams cad rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lta ba sdug pa can ma yin pa'i khyim dag tu yang spyi bar 'gyur ba yin/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam kyis bstan pa la yang mngon par 'byung ba la yad ga zhel ba ya ni 'dod pa' yon tan lnga po dag kyang spyod ba yin na// chos bzhi pa 'di yang rjes
su thob par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sa chos bcu rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod par byed pa rjes su thob
par 'gyur da yin/ sams can thams cad kyi rten bsgrub pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrub pa med na yang rjes su thob par gyur ba/
yan rnam par thar pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su thob nas/ spu'i khyod bu re re las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dbagatumed pa dag 'byed pa mAn ) 'od za'i
tshores kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'bum dag snang bar byed pa yin/ bodawor de la yang pad+ma 'bum dag man par sprul par byed pa 'ani/ pad+ma thams cad la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sprul
bar byed pa yin/ de bzhin gshags pa'i ris kyang tshes bstan pa re res sems can bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag yodas su smin par byed de/ ji ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid ma g.yos
pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu s kyang yodas su smin par byed pa yani/ sgab pa med pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas/ spu ga ge ba re re las me'i phung po lhun po ji snyed bab
byed pa yani/ spu'i cha de nyid las kyang nu'argyun gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rab tu 'bab par byed pa yin te/ sgrub ba med pa 'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dad ldan las kyang//
de bzhin gshagos pas stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams spu gcig ga rtsa mas bug ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'bangs gang/ de bas kyang
[f ]lhag par 'o pas kyang/ sems can de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du khrid do// kun tu 'di do snyam du ma sems so// shAr dwa ta'i bu slob ba
med pa'i rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas phyogs thams cad kyis nges pa'i tshig dag rab tu shes so/ sems can thams cad kyi sems
kyi rgyad la bye ba phrag 'bum nas skyes pa dang 'gags pa dag rab tu shes so// sems can la bye ba phrag 'bum du skyes pa rnams kyi chos kyi tho rtsom dag so sor sel bar byed do/ te/
bzhin gshags pa 'byung bar ma 'gyur ba dang/ chos gnas par ma 'gyur ba der yang rnam par thar pa phun sum tshogs pa de dang ldan pas/ sems can thams cad kyis nas tshan/
gcad pa yang rab tu shes so// sems rab tu 'dzin pa yang rab tu shes so// sems kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang sems kyargyu ba yang rab tu shes sa// shA ra da ti'i bu de ltar sgrub pa med pa'i
rnam par thar pa brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pan/ chos thams cad la so sor sgrib pa'i gnas rab tu shes so/ gcig tu mthar thug pa chad pa dang/ dngos po thams cad kyi stod pa dngos
po me da par shes pa de dang/ yongs su 'dzazhi pa thams cad la bdag ga u0f7aba' 'du shes ma skyed do// chos gcig nges par bsams na mdza dashes rab tu shes pa ma gtogs yin//
mdza' bshes thoms cad la bdag gi ba'i 'du shes can ma yin no// chos ma yin pa skyed pa la mdza' bshes ma yin par shes nas/ 'dus byas thams cad kyi
gnas la yon tan gyi gnas gtsage kyang ma mthong ngo// 'dus byas thams cad la yon tan med pa dang/ skyon dang bcas par shes nas/ chos de 'dra ba de dag rjes su thob pa/ra 'gyur ro/
gzhan yang chos bzhi rjes su thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe no/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyorab rgyun chad la rjes su thob pa yani/ lam du 'gro ban yad sems can gang dag gis de
bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs dag la reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad la yang dag par gtad par 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo'i tshod tsam la gzigs nA yad/
lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nas dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis su sa yodas su 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la nA gang mnyam par ma gzhug par 'gyur ba'i thugs
'ga' yang ma mnga' ste/ shAr dwa ta'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa na rtagatu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no// shAr dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la na ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa'am
tade nge 'dzin las g.yo ba mi mnga' ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad na chos yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin no/// de nas bcom ldan/
'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal te/ gang ga don du shogar las// sems can rnams la 'ang sAde rje nyid// chos la gus dang bcas pa yis///
ye shes de la pha rol gro// sems can rnams kyi sems shes dang// 'dzag rten gsum du ma g.yos pa'o// rdzu 'phrul rtogs par gang 'dod pas// chos la gus dad bcas
par bya rtachos la gus dang bcas byas na// rtag tu mchod 'os nyid du 'gyur// sas rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i// chos mchog la yang reg par 'gyur// chos la gus par byas na/
de la dran pa nyams ma 'gyur// skye ba de dang de kun tu// de yi dran pa rab tu 'phel// chos de la na gus byas na// gzugs las nyams par ma 'gyur te// yan lag nying lag mdzes pa
dang/ rtag tu tshu la dugs par 'gyur// rtag par 'dren rnams mnyes byed cing// mthong na de la dang byed la// sems kyis 'du byed dad pa yis// 'jig rten 'dun rnams mchod byed
pa// skye ba de dang de kun tu// de yi dad pa btu 'phel/ 'dod pa ngan pa sbyin ma byed/ spus nas myur du rab tu 'byung/ rtag tu tshul khrims phung po la bdu// mkhas pa rab tu
gnas par gyur// tshul khrims kyis kyang rlom sems med// de la ting 'dzin tshol bar byed// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// ting nge 'dzan la'ang rlom sems med///
khyad/ 'jig rten kun gyi mchog gang yin/ arab la bad pa'i zhang ston// rtag tu'ang yi sa ldan par gyun/ (ya shas kyis kyang rlom sems med// ye
la shes de las ma rlom zhing// don sangs rgyas chos rnams tshol// sa sa rgyasakyas na desngags pa 'a gzus// chos kyi snad da thob par 'gyur// chos kyi snod du mkhyen nas kyang//
